records.location_details: A rubber boat with approx. 25 migrants was detected south of Chios in Greek territorial waters. A Turkish patrol boat later took over responsibility inside Turkish territorial waters.
records.where_clear: South of Chios, Greek territorial waters, incident concluded in Turkish territorial waters.
records.location_text_raw: south of Chios in Greek territorial waters
records.context_note: A Danish helicopter detected a rubber boat with approx. 25 migrants in Greek territorial waters. The Hellenic Coast Guard took over, and subsequently, a Turkish patrol boat took responsibility for the incident in Turkish territorial waters. The event was registered as a 'Prevention of Departure'.
records.evidence_quote: On 27.07.2020 at 06:21LT a Danish helicopter detected a rubber boat with approx. 25 migrants south of Chios in Greek territorial waters.
